response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored to enhance your specific needs or aspirations. We believe its worth exceeds $15,000, but considering the current market conditions and our commitment to making it accessible, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and unparalleled customer support to ensure your satisfaction. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can significantly benefit you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 18000}
